Package com.safjnest.Utilities

Class PermissionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.safjnest.Utilities.PermissionHandler
public class PermissionHandler extends Object
This class handles all matters related to discord permissions. It also stores the discord tags of the members that have special permissions.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Leon412

    • getFilteredPermissionNames

      public static List<String> getFilteredPermissionNames(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Member member)
      Get the filtered permissions of a member in the guild that the command is executed in.

      Only takes the permissions that are returned from getImportantPermissionsValue

      Parameters:
      member - Member to check
      Returns:
      List of permission names

      public static long getImportantPermissionsValue()
      Gets the value of the important permissions.
      Returns:
      The long rappresentation of the permissions that are important for the bot

    • getMaxFieldableRoleNames

      public static List<String> getMaxFieldableRoleNames(List<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Role> roles, int charNumber)
      Gets the maximum number of roles that can fit in an embed's field and makes a list with their names omitting the ones that would make the field too long.
      Parameters:
      roles - List of roles
      charNumber - Maximum number of characters
      Returns:
      List of roles names

    • hasPermission

      public static boolean hasPermission(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Member theGuy, net.dv8tion.jda.api.Permission permission)
      Checks if a member has a specific permission.

      If the member is in the untouchables list, it returns true.

      Parameters:
      theGuy - Member to check
      permission - Permission to check
      Returns:
      True if the member has the permission, false otherwise
